> 70ping to 500 variance is not acceptable fix your fucking shit

It's very likely this is actually a problem with your own connection. May just be your area is too remote or your internet provider sucks. Make sure you try all there official lag tips [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

> make bear claw have an alt upgrade path...

WTF is that? There is no item in League with bear nor claw in it's name. With the exception of Typhoon Claws that was temporary.
